description:
Enable teams to host shared templates in Git repositories that team members can sync from. Support private repos with authentication and automatic updates when the remote template changes.

**Rationale:** Organizations need centralized control over development environments to ensure consistency across team members while maintaining security for proprietary configurations.
title: Team-wide template sharing via Git repositories
